isadora
  • API Reference
  • isadora
  • isadora.constants
  • View page source

isadora.constants

Physical and atmospheric constants used throughout the ISADORA package.

This module defines a centralized container for physical constants required by the International Standard Atmosphere (ISA) model and related thermodynamic computations. All constants are expressed in SI units and wrapped using the internal unit-handling system.

The constants are instantiated once and exposed through the CONSTANTS object.

Notes

  • Constants are stored as unit-aware objects where applicable.

  • Values correspond to standard ISA sea-level conditions unless otherwise stated.

  • This module is intended to be read-only after initialization.

Classes

__Constants

isadora.constants.CONSTANTS

Singleton instance containing all defined constants.

Type:

__Constants

Attributes

Singleton instance containing all physical and atmospheric constants.

Classes

__Constants

Container class for physical and atmospheric constants.

Module Contents

class isadora.constants.__Constants

Container class for physical and atmospheric constants.

This class encapsulates all constants used by the ISA model, including sea-level reference values and universal physical constants. Each constant is defined as a unit-aware parameter and initialized with its corresponding numerical value.

Notes

This class is intended for internal use only and should not be instantiated directly by users. A singleton instance is exposed as CONSTANTS.

MSL_TEMPERATURE: isadora.units._UnitParam
MSL_PRESSURE: isadora.units._UnitParam
MSL_DENSITY: isadora.units._UnitParam
MSL_DYNAMIC_VISCOSITY: isadora.units._UnitParam
MSL_KINEMATIC_VISCOSITY: isadora.units._UnitParam
g: isadora.units._UnitParam
R: isadora.units._UnitParam
R_: isadora.units._UnitParam
r: isadora.units._UnitParam
M: isadora.units._UnitParam
a_o: isadora.units._UnitParam
y: float | int = 1.4
c_p: isadora.units._UnitParam
c_v: isadora.units._UnitParam
S: isadora.units._UnitParam
isadora.constants.CONSTANTS

Singleton instance containing all physical and atmospheric constants.

This object should be imported and used wherever constants are required within the ISADORA package.
